title: Youtube video freezing repeatedly while the audio continues
content:
Like the subject line says, every single youtube video I watch has a video freezing problem where it's not paused but the picture freezes every 20 frames or so and it makes videos entirely unwatchable. I had a problem with this when I first switched to Firefox a few months ago and I found a solution in an old reddit post, but since updating to 119.0, that solution no longer works and I have exhausted all fixes I can think of. The previous solution was: "Firefox 104 introduced some new video performance improvements, you can disable them by going to about:config and changing media.wmf.zero-copy-nv12-texture and gfx.direct3d11.reuse-decoder-device to false then restart." I have tried watching videos both with these settings and without these settings and the issue persists. Other things I have tried that did not work: -disabling all extensions/troubleshoot mode and watching in an incognito window -clearing cache/cookies/data -disabling hardware acceleration -viewing youtube with the popout media player -crying and begging

I'm at my wits' end please help
creator: Yeetony
